Summary: 3 red glowing metallic and one bright white which seemed to eject the three smaller red ones
divs: Sighting DetailsOff country road three friends and myself goofin off. My buddy starts screaming with his flashlight pointing straight up. A metallic object was hovering about 20 ft above him silently. I could see mettalic bottom. Red light swirling under body of craft. We then noticed two more. We watched them dance in the sky shooting every direction. Sometimes in loops. They met up with larger white object that rose from behing distant tree line. They appeared to become part of it then break off again. Watched for bout 20 min before they sissappeared or shot upwards.
